title: South Texas teen shot by brother while watching 'The Walking Dead'
content:
Tue, 21 Oct 2014 03:05:59 GMT — A Corpus Christi teen is dead after his brother killed him in a tragic accident, reports indicate.
Authorities said the 24-year-old was removing his gun from its holster when the 9mm pistol discharged.
The 16-year-old was struck in the chest and transported to a hospital by EMS where he was later pronounced dead.
The two brothers were watching an episode of "The Walking Dead when the accident occurred, Action 10 News in Corpus Christi reports.
The accidental shooting happened Sunday night, according to the Corpus Christi Police Department.
Authorities responded to an apartment in back of the family TMs home where they found the younger brother with a gunshot wound.
Their mother witnessed the shooting, and family members also call it an accident, according to the local CBS affiliate.
Detectives are in the processes of investigating the death, and no arrests have been made as Corpus Christi police have called it an accidental shooting.
